name: ncbitools
publications: Altschul, Stephen F., Thomas L. Madden, Alejandro A. Schaeffer, Jinghui Zhang, Zheng Zhang, Webb Miller, and David J. Lipman (1997), Gapped BLAST and PSI-BLAST: a new generation of protein database search programs, Nucleic Acids Res. 25:3389-3402.
description: The ToolBox model and code is used extensively within NCBI for the internal pipelines and tools such as GenBank, Entrez, BLAST, Sequin, OMIM, RefSeq, and others
